[[File:Caura_Balgas.jpg|thumb|Balgas model]] '''Balgas''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|バルカス}}, ''Barukasu'') are a family of rare horned quadrupedal enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}. Balgas are similar in appearance to [[Ories]]. Like Ories, they resemble bulls or yaks, although there is no equivalent to [[Aries]].
There is a minor appearance change between games; in {{XC}} they have glowing blue and purple lines, whereas in {{XC2}} and {{XC3}} they do not.
== {{XC|-}} == In {{XC}}, Balgas are found only on [[Prison Island]]. Only two types of Balgas exist.
=== Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Caura Balgas]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Fiendish Auburn]]
== {{XC2|-}} == In {{XC2}}, Balgas can only be found in [[Temperantia]].
=== Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Amman Balgas]]
=== Note === Despite all of the [[Ardun]] forms leading up to [[Relentless Arduran]], it has the model of a Balgas and looks like Amman Balgas. This may imply that Balgas are the same species as Armus and Arduns, and probably a dominant male (Ardun) in this game.
== {{XC3|-}} == In {{XC3}}, Balgas can be found on the [[Syra Hovering Reefs]].
=== Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Costa Balgas]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Hornbow Dante]]
